name: Galactic Cube
description:
A simple and minimalist, yet fun game, made in just two days!

There's literally nothing but you, a cube, in the outer space, and you'll have to dodge endless obstacles which will come at you!

Move left or right with the left and right arrow keys, or the A and D keys to dodge and Esc to pause cause everyone needs a break sometimes :')

Your score increases whenever an obstacle goes past you, and if you crash or go out of the borders... well you die.

Music in the game:
